list_definition.definition: the space between things, places etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Some of the children have to walk long distances to school
It’s quite a distance to the bus stop
It is difficult to judge distance when driving at night
What’s the distance from here to London?
We could see the town in the distance
The picture looks better at a distance.

An experimental study for different distances (0.6 to 5 m) has allowed the identification of the sensor model parameters.
The diffusion regime can be observed t o set in only for distances from the source between 5 and 10.
Our goal is to find a control law that determines u such that the helicopter follows other helicopters with desired threedimensional relative distances.
The upper limit of measured separation distances was established by the size of the test volume.
Their workloads have been augmented because they have had to travel longer distances to fish, garden and find untainted firewood.
They observed that for the same jumping height, different take-off angles would result in different jump distances.
At large distances from the circular cylinder the total magnetic field consists of two parts.
